T1.label: Growth/Recovery
T1.description: Horizon Minerals Limited executes on growth strategy; earnings accelerate
T1.plain_english: This is the bull case — Horizon Minerals Limited delivers on its key initiatives and the market rewards it.
T1.what_to_watch: Next earnings result and forward guidance.
T1.upside: Material re-rating if execution surprises to the upside.
T1.risk_plain: If growth disappoints, this narrative weakens.

T2.label: Base Case/Managed
T2.description: Horizon Minerals Limited delivers steady-state results; valuation holds
T2.plain_english: The company continues on its current trajectory — neither surprising positively nor negatively.
T2.risk_plain: If the base case is already priced in, limited upside from here.

T3.label: Risk/Downside
T3.description: Horizon Minerals Limited faces headwinds; earnings or multiples compress
T3.plain_english: This is the bear case — something goes wrong and the stock de-rates.
T3.what_to_watch: Cost pressures, competitive threats, or macro headwinds.
T3.risk_plain: Material downside if multiple risks crystallise simultaneously.

T4.label: Disruption/Catalyst
T4.description: A structural shift changes the investment case for Horizon Minerals Limited
T4.plain_english: An external force — technology, regulation, or competition — fundamentally alters the business.
T4.what_to_watch: Industry disruption signals and regulatory changes.
T4.risk_plain: If disruption materialises, prior assumptions become invalid.

big_picture: Horizon Minerals Limited (ASX: HRZ) — coverage initiated. Full analysis pending.

commodity_overlay.breakeven_note: HRZ is pre-production. AISC is estimated from DFS. Actual costs unknown until first pour.
commodity_overlay.secondary_note: AUD weakness amplifies gold tailwind for AUD-cost producer
commodity_overlay.sensitivity: +A$100/oz gold ≈ significant FCF uplift (pre-production — sensitivity estimate only)
